files.description: Implements a one-command Python build runner that sequentially runs artifact gate, taxonomy validation, and the toy meta-analysis demo while forcing all logs/outputs into _build/ and exiting non-zero on any missing/empty artifact.

Summary: Added a runnable example script that demonstrates successful and failing builds with all logs/outputs under _build/ and non-zero exit codes for missing/empty artifacts.

files.description: End-to-end tests that create temporary dummy artifacts and stub commands to verify sequential execution, _build/ output enforcement, and non-zero exit behavior for missing/empty artifacts.
Configures packaging and tooling, including a console script entrypoint for the build runner and pytest configuration for the included tests.

missionDescription: Implement the one-command build runner that sequentially runs: artifact gate, taxonomy validation, and the toy meta-analysis demo; enforce that all outputs/logs land in `_build/` and the process exits non-zero on any missing/empty artifact.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Creates an end-to-end orchestration path (runner executes → artifacts produced → artifacts verified → logs saved) with hard-fail behavior, directly enabling repeatable evaluation of verification pipel...
